item.text: Now there were these prophets and teachers in the church at Antioch: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius the Cyrenian, Manaen (a close friend of Herod the tetrarch from childhood) and Saul.

While <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="3008" class="">serving</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3522" class="">fasting</st>, the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="873" class="">Set apart</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4569" class="">Saul</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st> to <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> I have <st data-num="4341" class="">called</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.”
Then, after they had fasted and prayed and placed their hands on them, they sent them off.
So Barnabas and Saul, sent out by the Holy Spirit, went down to Seleucia, and from there they sailed to Cyprus.

When<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="1096" class="">arrived</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4529" class="">Salamis</st>,<n id="3" /> they began to <st data-num="2605" class="">proclaim</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jewish</st> <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogues</st>.<n id="5" /> (<st data-num="1161">Now</st> they <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st><n id="6" /> as their <st data-num="5257">assistant</st>.)<n id="7" />

When they had <st data-num="1330" class="">crossed over</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="3520" class="">island</st> <st data-num="891">as far as</st> <st data-num="3974" class="">Paphos</st>,<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> a <st data-num="3097" class="">magician</st>, a <st data-num="2453" class="">Jewish</st> <st data-num="5578">false prophet</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">named</st> <st data-num="919" class="">Bar-Jesus</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="446">proconsul</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4588" class="">Sergius</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paulus</st>, an <st data-num="4908" class="">intelligent</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st>. The <st data-num="3778" class="">proconsul</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4341" class="">summoned</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4569" class="">Saul</st> and <st data-num="1934" class="">wanted</st> to <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="3097" class="">magician</st> <st data-num="1681" class="">Elymas</st><n id="1" /> (<st data-num="1063">for</st> <st data-num="3779">that is the way</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> is <st data-num="3177" class="">translated)</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="436" class="">opposed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2212" class="">trying</st> to <st data-num="1294" class="">turn</st> the <st data-num="446" class="">proconsul</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1294" class="">away</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4569" class="">Saul</st> (<st data-num="2532">also</st> known as <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul)</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4130" class="">filled</st> with the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="816">stared straight</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>

and <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="5599">You who are</st> <st data-num="4134" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1388" class="">deceit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4468" class="">wrongdoing</st>,<n id="1" /> you <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> of the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st>, you <st data-num="2190" class="">enemy</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>—will you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3973" class="">stop</st> <st data-num="1294">making crooked</st> the <st data-num="2117" class="">straight</st> <st data-num="3598" class="">paths</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>?<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3568" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2400" class="">look</st>, the <st data-num="5495">hand</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> is <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">unable</st> to <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="2246" class="">sun</st> <st data-num="891" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st>!” <st data-num="3916" class="">Immediately</st> <st data-num="887" class="">mistiness</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4655" class="">darkness</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="4013">went around</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">seeking</st> people<n id="5" /> to <st data-num="5497" class="">lead</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="5497">by the hand</st>.
Then when the proconsul saw what had happened, he believed because he was greatly astounded at the teaching about the Lord.
Then Paul and his companions put out to sea from Paphos and came to Perga in Pamphylia, but John left them and returned to Jerusalem.

<st data-num="1330" class="">Moving on</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4011" class="">Perga</st>,<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="3854" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4099" class="">Pisidian</st> <st data-num="490" class="">Antioch</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> on the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> they <st data-num="1525">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogue</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2523">sat down</st>.

<st data-num="3326" class="">After</st> the <st data-num="320" class="">reading</st> from the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="752" class="">leaders of the synagogue</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> a message,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="80">Brothers</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">have</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">any</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st><n id="5" /> of <st data-num="3874" class="">exhortation</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">speak</st> it.”<n id="7" />

So Paul stood up, gestured with his hand and said,

“Men of Israel, and you Gentiles who fear God, listen:

The <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1586" class="">chose</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5312" class="">made</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="5312" class="">great</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">during</st> their <st data-num="3940">stay as foreigners</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">country</st><n id="5" /> of <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5308" class="">uplifted</st> <st data-num="1023" class="">arm</st><n id="6" /> he <st data-num="1806" class="">led</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1537">out of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

For<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="5550" class="">period</st> of <st data-num="5613" class="">about</st> <st data-num="5063">forty years</st> he <st data-num="5159">put up</st> with<n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2048" class="">wilderness</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2507" class="">After</st><n id="1" /> he had <st data-num="2507" class="">destroyed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nations</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="5477" class="">Canaan</st>, he <st data-num="2624" class="">gave</st> his people <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">land</st> as an <st data-num="2624" class="">inheritance</st>.<n id="4" />

All this took<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">about</st> <st data-num="5071 4004" class="">450</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st>. <st data-num="3326" class="">After</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st><n id="2" /> he <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> them <st data-num="2923" class="">judges</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> the time of<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4545" class="">Samuel</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st>.

<st data-num="2547" class="">Then</st> they <st data-num="154" class="">asked</st> for a <st data-num="935" class="">king</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4549" class="">Saul</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="2797" class="">Kish</st>, a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="5443" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="958" class="">Benjamin</st>, who ruled<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5062" class="">forty</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st>.
After removing him, God raised up David their king. He testified about him: ‘I have found David the son of Jesse to be a man after my heart, who will accomplish everything I want him to do.’

<st data-num="575" class="">From</st> the <st data-num="4690" class="">descendants</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="3778">this man</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st> to <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st> a <st data-num="4990" class="">Savior</st>, <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="2596">just as</st> he <st data-num="1860" class="">promised</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="4253" class="">Before</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1529" class="">arrived</st>, <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st><n id="3" /> had <st data-num="4296" class="">proclaimed</st> a <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st> for <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="3839" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>.

<st data-num="1161">But</st> <st data-num="5613">while</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> was <st data-num="4137" class="">completing</st> his <st data-num="1408" class="">mission</st>,<n id="1" /> he said <st data-num="3004" class="">repeatedly</st>,<n id="2" /> ‘<st data-num="5101">What</st> do you <st data-num="5282" class="">think</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st>? <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> he. <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2400" class="">look</st>, one is <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st> to <st data-num="3089" class="">untie</st> the <st data-num="5266" class="">sandals</st> on his <st data-num="4228" class="">feet!’</st><n id="3" />

<st data-num="80">Brothers</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5207" class="">descendants</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="11">Abraham’s</st> <st data-num="1085" class="">family</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those Gentiles <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> who <st data-num="5399" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,<n id="4" /> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st><n id="5" /> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation</st> has been <st data-num="1821" class="">sent</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the people who <st data-num="2730" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="758" class="">rulers</st> did <st data-num="50">not recognize</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778">him</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="4137" class="">fulfilled</st> the <st data-num="5456" class="">sayings</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> that are <st data-num="314" class="">read</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2919">condemning</st><n id="4" /> him.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Though</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3367" class="">no</st> <st data-num="156" class="">basis</st><n id="3" /> for a <st data-num="2288">death sentence</st>,<n id="4" /> they <st data-num="154" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st> to have <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="337" class="">executed</st>.

<st data-num="5613" class="">When</st> they had <st data-num="5055" class="">accomplished</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> that was <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, they <st data-num="2507" class="">took</st> him <st data-num="2507" class="">down</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3586" class="">cross</st><n id="4" /> and <st data-num="5087" class="">placed</st> him<n id="5" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>,

and<n id="1" /> for <st data-num="4183">many</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> he <st data-num="3708">appeared</st> to those who had <st data-num="4872" class="">accompanied</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1056" class="">Galilee</st> <st data-num="1519">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>. <st data-num="3748" class="">These</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witnesses</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="2097" class="">proclaim</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="2097">good news</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">about</st> the <st data-num="1860" class="">promise</st> to our <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st>,<n id="1" />
that this promise God has fulfilled to us, their children, by raising Jesus, as also it is written in the second psalm, ‘You are my Son; today I have fathered you.’
But regarding the fact that he has raised Jesus from the dead, never again to be in a state of decay, God has spoken in this way: ‘I will give you the holy and trustworthy promises made to David.’
Therefore he also says in another psalm, ‘You will not permit your Holy One to experience decay.’

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>, after he had <st data-num="5256" class="">served</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="1012" class="">purpose</st> in <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st>, <st data-num="2837" class="">died</st>,<n id="2" /> was <st data-num="4369" class="">buried</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">experienced</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1312" class="">decay</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the one<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1453">raised up</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">experience</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1312" class="">decay</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> let it <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1110" class="">known</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="80">brothers</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> one<n id="1" /> <st data-num="859" class="">forgiveness</st> of <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> is <st data-num="2605" class="">proclaimed</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,

<st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3778">this</st> one<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> who <st data-num="4100" class="">believes</st> is <st data-num="1344" class="">justified</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> from <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> of <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1344" class="">justify</st><n id="3" /> you.<n id="4" />
Watch out, then, that what is spoken about by the prophets does not happen to you:

‘Look, you scoffers; be amazed and perish!

For I am doing a work in your days,

a work you would never believe, even if someone tells you.’”
As Paul and Barnabas were going out, the people were urging them to speak about these things on the next Sabbath.

When the meeting of the synagogue had broken up, many of the Jews and God-fearing proselytes followed Paul and Barnabas, who were speaking with them and were persuading them to continue in the grace of God.
On the next Sabbath almost the whole city assembled together to hear the word of the Lord.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st>, they were <st data-num="4130" class="">filled</st> with <st data-num="2205" class="">jealousy</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they began to <st data-num="483" class="">contradict</st><n id="2" /> what <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> was <st data-num="2980" class="">saying</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="987" class="">reviling</st> him.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="5037">Both</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st> <st data-num="3955" class="">courageously</st>,<n id="1" /> “It <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="316" class="">necessary</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st>. <st data-num="1894" class="">Since</st> you <st data-num="683" class="">reject</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2919" class="">consider</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>, we<n id="4" /> are <st data-num="4762" class="">turning</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>.<n id="5" />
For this is what the Lord has commanded us: ‘I have appointed you to be a light for the Gentiles, to bring salvation to the ends of the earth.’”

When the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this, they began to <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1392" class="">praise</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of the <st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">all</st> who had <st data-num="1510">been</st> <st data-num="5021" class="">appointed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> was <st data-num="1308" class="">spreading</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="5561" class="">region</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="3951" class="">incited</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4576" class="">God-fearing</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st> of <st data-num="2158">high social standing</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4413">prominent men</st> of the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>, <st data-num="1892">stirred up</st> <st data-num="1375" class="">persecution</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">threw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="575">out<n id="2" /> of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3725" class="">region</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> after they <st data-num="1621" class="">shook</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2868" class="">dust</st> <st data-num="1621">off</st> their <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st><n id="2" /> in protest <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, they <st data-num="2064" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2430" class="">Iconium</st>.<n id="3" />
And the disciples were filled with joy and with the Holy Spirit.
